home.home_about_text_1: I am a Medical Doctor specialized in Diagnostic Imaging. My career includes training in Nuclear Medicine, international studies in Computed Tomography and Magnetic Resonance, as well as a continuous dedication to medical practice and teaching. My commitment to training future doctors and improving healthcare has been a constant. Learn more about my history and contributions to the field of Medicine!
home.home_services_text_1: Telediagnosis in CT, MRI and PET

services.text_1: With our telediagnosis service, Dr. María Levin provides remote study reports and diagnoses. Efficiency and precision are essential to provide fast, quality support to healthcare professionals.
services.text_2: We offer advanced MRI services to obtain detailed images of internal structures. Our highly trained team ensures accurate studies and detailed analyzes to support the medical diagnosis.
services.text_3: We perform high-quality computed tomography studies to obtain detailed images of organs and tissues. Our accurate and reliable reports contribute to accurate diagnosis and proper treatment plan.

about.text_1: Graduated from the UBA Faculty of Medicine in 1975, with a first specialization in Nuclear Medicine - the theoretical part studied at the CONEA Heavy Water facilities in Ezeiza, the practical part as a fellow of the Roffo Hospita´s Nuclear Medicine Department. In 1980 I was granted a scholarship from the General Electric CO to study Computed Tomography in San Francisco, California, USA and during those months I also studied Magnetic Resonance in South San Francisco, with Dr. León Kaufman who was developing a prototype. Between 1981 and 1986 I worked in a private clinic in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil in charge of Neuroimaging, especially Tomography of the brain and spine. From 1989 to 2002 I worked in total Body Magnetic Resonance with Dr Alberto Eurnekián at the San Martín de Tours clinic and Argerich Hospital (Outsourced Service). Since 1995 to date, I have been in charge of the Computed Tomography Service at the Santojanni Hospital, taking care of the practice and also teaching since  this hospital is attached to UBA Medical School. I have been a Radiographers Professor at UNSAM between 2000 and 2022 as well.
